titleStmt.title: A Description of Buda, in its ancient and present state with an exact and compleat account of the siege thereof : began by the Duke of Lorrain, July 14. 1684, and continued by him and the elector of Bavaria, till November the first, at which time the siege was raised.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for T.M. and sold by Will. Benbridge ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
